episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_1001_0: Great, you’re all here! That’s convenient!
I have a favor to ask of you!
Um... Before that, what’s up with your outfit?

The young master’s currently wearing a sygna suit
that matches his new partner Pokémon, Gholdengo.

Yeah, it’s like, totes special and sparkles like gold,
just like Gholdengo.

I suppose anyone can tell at a glance that you’re
the owner of Pasio when you’re wearing an outfit
that showy.

In any case! Let’s get back to what I was about
to say!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_1001_1: I have a new plan in mind, you see...
The concept is to collect a thousand bonds!

Thus, I want everyone to send me photos of sync
pairs socializing with each other!
And once I’ve received a thousand photos...
I’m planning on hosting a huge party to celebrate!

Ooooh, a party? That’s real generous of you,
Lear!
Heheheh! I got the idea from Gholdengo!

Gholdengo’s body is made of a thousand coins, or
so I’ve learned!

It evolved after we collected enough coins—a
full dazzling thousand! That’s what sparked my
inspiration for this idea!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_1001_2:
Surpassing a thousand bonds means Pasio will
continue to grow and develop!

I guess it would be a good opportunity to socialize
with everyone!

Of course it would! Let’s start spreading the
word so all the sync pairs on Pasio start
snapping photos!

I’ll spare no cost! I don’t care how many attendees
end up joining the party!

Everything will be financed by yours truly, and
every sync pair will be treated to the finest
hospitality!

Um... Then, the thing you needed us to assist you
with is...

Indeed—I want your help as photographers!
Assist me in achieving our goal of collecting a
thousand photos!
So? Will you accept this task?
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_0401_3: Good answer. I expected no less.
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_0402_3: Heh. You’ve gotten used to this, haven’t you!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4001_1001_3:
There were a few other people who I wanted to
reach out to personally.
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/6801_1001_0:
The golden creator who shines the brightest light
on Pasio... That’s me!

I, Lear, command you to feast your eyes on
my brilliance!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4002_1001_0: I am here to bestow my thanks upon you!

Rosa, you’ve been doing a great job promoting
Pasio as its tourism ambassador!

Brock and Misty, you’ve been helping to raise
awareness of Pasio since before we even held
the PML!

On everyone’s behalf, I want you to know that
your efforts have not gone unnoticed! Be thankful
for my praise!

Even when you’re complimenting us, you still
manage to sound condescending...

Yeah, that’s one thing that’s been consistent since
we first met him.
True, but I think Lear’s changed a lot since then!
Oh, really? He’s changed that much?
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4002_1001_1: Yup... Remember when we first met Lear?

He didn’t care about friendship and treated
people and Pokémon like tools! He couldn’t
even use sync moves!

He was always looking down on us for working
together as a team, rejecting the idea completely.

He was especially mean to
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I recall...

Yeah, but that’s because [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] reminds Lear of the
time he lost to Red!

We may as well have just called him “the Selfish
Prince” back then.

I’m right here! How dare you besmirch me right in
front of my face!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4002_1001_2: Oh... You mean you didn’t ask it to?

You’re always doing these things without my
permission!
I’m not going to let this slide! HOOPAAAA!

I must admit, Hoopa’s pranks have gotten more
sophisticated lately...

With Gholdengo here, the pranks are even more
devious than before!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4002_1001_3: Is that so? Must be tough.

Why must all these pranksters gather around ME,
of all people?!
It just shows how much they like you.

Mhm. Especially after becoming a Trainer who
Pokémon can trust.

Oh-ho! Sounds like you’ve got some good stories
about Lear, too!
Would you mind sharing them with us?

By the way...didn’t Rosa say something about you
losing to Red?
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4002_1001_4:
Fine! I’ll show you here and now the results of all
the training I’ve gone through with Gholdengo!

Let’s do this, Gholdengo! We’ll show him just how
outclassed he is!
Hahaha! Both Lear and Red are raring to go!
You’ll be getting a taste of OUR strength!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4003_1001_0: W-wow! He really pushed Red to his limits!

Gholdengo and I worked together to build up and
polish our strength!

What’s wrong, Red? Shocked you speechless,
have I?
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4003_0301_0: He says it was a great battle!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4003_0401_0:
Graaah! How about you look a little more
defeated, then?! This is why I don’t like you!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4003_0402_0:
Hmph! Not that I need praise from you!
Not one bit!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4003_1001_1:
Red is acknowledging how strong you are now,
Lear!

I’m glad you two ended up becoming good rivals
for each other.

I’m here to take some photos with you all, as
proof of our interaction today!
There we go! Got it, Lear!
Let’s get going, then! On to the next bond!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4004_1101_0:
The group continued to make good progress
collecting photos and eventually reached
a thousand...
and some time after that, a party was held!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4004_1001_0: This is my partner Pokémon, Gholdengo.

I used the sheer power of my wealth to collect
Gimmighoul Coins so that it could evolve!

Look at this brilliant, shining figure! How bold!
How dignified!

I see you’ve poured more than just your wealth
into it, though!

Indeed. It seems to have been raised with a lot of
love.
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4005_1001_0:
There he goes, showin’ off his partner Pokémon
again...
I kind of understand. He must be very proud.

Er... He is, no doubt about it, but that’s not
actually the young master’s true intent here.

Yeah, the real reason he wanted to throw
this party...

is ’cause his Gholdengo is, like, suuuuper friendly
and wanted more friends to play with.

That’s really why he went out of his way to
plan an event that lots of people and Pokémon
would attend.

It was the young master’s way of showing he
cares.
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4005_1001_1:
So it’s not just their appearances that are bright
and shiny, huh?

Yeah. There's a warm light you can’t see with
your eyes, but you can feel with your heart...

And it’s making Lear and Gholdengo shine
even brighter.
All right! Let’s party it up, then!

I wanna show off how well we’ve bonded with
our Pokémon, too!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_1001_0:
I’m glad you all enjoyed yourselves, but it’s time
to wrap things up.

After holding a large party like this, allow me to
share with you something I’ve felt and reaffirmed.

It’s true that money is power—and a formidable
power, at that.
However, there are things that money can’t buy.

What is the greatest power that you felt here at
this party?
Was it the power of my wealth?
Or did you feel a power even greater than that?

Thanks to all of your support, we were able to
collect a thousand photos of everyone socializing
with each other.
All of those photos shine brightly...
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_1001_1:
with the power of our bonds with each other! That
is the greatest, strongest power in the world, and
it is priceless!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_0401_1:
Hey! Who said you could be so chummy with me?
Show more respect!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_0302_1:
The king who treasures
the power of bonds!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_0402_1:
Precisely! I, Lear, will be the king who treasures
the power of bonds!
episode_event_ch0066_10_boss/4009_1001_1:
Bonds make Pasio shine, so a thousand isn’t
enough, is it?
Let’s aim for TEN thousand next time!

I promise that once we reach that number, I’ll host
an even larger, grander party than this one!
